snippet: Signature Compounding Pharmacy of Orlando, Fla., was raided in 2007 after an investigation by the district attorney in Albany County, N.Y., into the online sale of the drugs.
abstract: Signature Compounding Pharmacy of Orlando, Fla, pleads guilty to criminal sale of controlled substance; it was raided in 2007 after investigation by Albany County, NY, investigators into online sale of steroids.
lead_paragraph: Signature Compounding Pharmacy of Orlando, Fla., was raided in 2007 after an investigation by the district attorney in Albany County, N.Y., into the online sale of the drugs.

headline.seo: Florida Pharmacy Guilty in New York Inquiry Into Steroid Sales
headline.main: Pharmacy Pleads Guilty in Upstate Steroids Case
headline.print_headline: Pharmacy Pleads Guilty In Upstate Steroids Case
